name: Out of Time (Raymond)
description:
Quick game made in under 18 hours (Supposed to have a week, but I got a late start.) for The Debug Log Unofficial Game Jam 1#. 

Gameplay is fairly simple.

Collect and craft potions to boost your stats, and reach the finish.  Oh and your stats and potions decay over time, so don't waste it.

Red makes potions last longer, Green effects Speed, Blue effects Size.

Controls:

  • WAD  / Joystick, movement
  • Space / Y, grab object.
  • R / Start, restart level.
  • Escape / Back, exits the game.

Credits:

Made with Unity 3D

All assets, code and the level made by Raymond Ellis
